name: Carracosta
description: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.

abilities.name: Solid Rock
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it.  This ability functions identically to filter.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is at full HP, any hit that would knock it out will instead leave it with 1 HP.  Regardless of its current HP, it is also immune to the one-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold.  If this Pokémon is holding a focus sash, this ability takes precedence and the item will not be consumed.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in rain.
